com.teamten.render
Class Color

java.lang.Object
  com.teamten.render.Color

public class Color
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an immutable ARGB color.

Method Detail

add

public Color add(Color other)
Returns the pair-wise sum of the colors. Alpha is unaffected by other's alpha.

multiply

public Color multiply(Color other)
Returns the pair-wise product of the colors (including alpha).

multiply

public Color multiply(double scalar)
Returns the color multiplied by a scalar. Only the color components are multiplied, not the transparency.

clamp

public Color clamp()
Clamp all elements to 0 and 1.

toArgb

public int toArgb()
Return the packed 32-bit ARGB representation.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
